extendedInfo.description: The app for cropping your images. You can use the trimmed picture.*******************************************  Usage*******************************************[Standalone]1. Launch the app from home app.2. Press image button.3. Select a image.4. Crop your image.5. You can see the cropped image on the screen, then can select the app for sending.[Launch from other apps]1. Call the func to select image in other apps.2. You can see the list to select image, then select this app.3. Proceed as same as standalone, and you can get the cropped image.*******************************************  Q&A*******************************************Q1.Not work.A1.Choose Android standard Gallery app when asked app to select images, and to trim images.----------Q2.Not work. I have tried to A1 solution.A2.Please notify in mail about items below.I try to solve as possible. The app has link to other apps, so I can solve the issue if it is my app bugs.- Device name- App version- Process to problem- What the problem happened----------Q3.Cropped image has black area.A3.It could have black area if trim the small image.----------Q4.App has been crashed, or occured the out of memory error.A4.Turn off the settings of 'High Resolution'.*******************************************  Recent changes*******************************************ver 1.7.3  - Modified the issue of crush on some device.ver 1.7.2ver 1.7.1  - Modified the issue of out of memory error on ver 1.7.ver 1.7  - Modified the name of settings.     "Quality" -> "Picture resolution"  - Added the feature to set the resolution after cropping.    (You can enabled in settings.)ver 1.6.2  - Modified the minor bugs.ver 1.6.1  - Modified the bug that a quality settings is to be illegal value when update from previous ver.1.5.1.ver 1.6.0  - Modified the name of settings.     "Size" -> "Quality"  - Added a item of quality settings.     "Max" : Max quality as possible. (do not beyond the original quality.)  - Modified an algorithm of quality settings.ver 1.5.1  - Modified the bug that first-time boot from other apps is be fail.ver 1.5.0  - Modified the descriptions.  - Set the middle size at default.ver 1.4.0  - Support horizontal screen.  - Button will be small on low resolution screen.ver 1.3.4  - Modified the bug that first-time users fail to load the image.ver 1.3.3  - Modified the minor bugs.ver 1.3.2  - Modified the bug that can't read some pictures.ver 1.3.1  - Modified the bug on some devices it can't proceed when enable editing settings every time.ver 1.3.0  - Added the feature to edit the settings when cropping an image every time .    (You can enabled in settings.)ver 1.2.0  - Added the feature to set the aspect ratio of portrait orientation.  - Modified the bug that show the wrong error message when your device would be low memory.ver 1.1.1  - Modified the bug that app is crashed when cooperate between apps.ver.1.1.0  - Added the feature to boot camera app directly.   (Unsupported app could be exist.)ver.1.0.1  - Modified the bug that a temporary file could be remained.*******************************************keyword:picture image crop cropping trim trimmingedit scale post facebook twitter flickr snsattach mail mat

reviews.title: Saves crop
reviews.comment: This application is the only one I know that not just crops but also saves the crop to the 9:16 size of my screen so that I don\'t have to crop every time. Well done.
reviews.author: Peter Andro

reviews.title: Waste
reviews.comment: Does the same thing the crop option on my phone does
reviews.author: Annalisa Schultz

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: Just takes me to my gallery to trim there
reviews.author: Alexia Swing
